item.title: code add
item.description: code add by TS : Initial plugin code. The heart of this plugin is the ModuleGenerator. The generator is contacting the input module and gets an iterator of all attributes names. This iterator will be then used to receive the values of the key. Till now we only use a Object to String cast but an input module does not have to return a simple String but can return any object. This may cause ClassCastExceptions for the values.

item.title: docs add
item.description: docs add by TS : Adding initial samples and documentation
